terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.mappers
Class DirectInputDragPlugin

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.mappers.InputDragMapperPlugin
      terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.mappers.DirectInputDragPlugin
public class DirectInputDragPlugin
extends InputDragMapperPlugin

An input drag mapper plugin that directly maps input drag value dimensions to target actuation value dimensions. All actuation value dimensions are affected.

The output actuation value is defined as follows:

  • X - Generic X actuation value.
  • Y - Generic Y actuation value.
  • Z - Generic Z actuation value.
  • W - Generic W actuation value

mapY - The target dimensions (Mapper.DIM_???) controlled by the source Y dimension.

toTargetValue

protected void toTargetValue(javax.vecmath.Tuple2d value,
                             javax.vecmath.Tuple4d copy)
Directly maps the 2D XY source space input value into a 4D XYZW target space actuation value, which affects all output dimensions. Output values are accumulated by dimension. Includes source scaling and target offset.

Parameters:
value - Source value.
copy - Container for the copied return value.
